description: This file defines a BudgetService class that provides static methods for fetching budgets and spending analytics for an authenticated user, interacting with a REST API.

classes.name: BudgetService
classes.description: A service class providing static methods to interact with budget and analytics endpoints of the API.

methods.name: fetchBudgets
methods.description: Asynchronously fetches the list of budgets for the authenticated user from the API.

methods.name: fetchAnalytics
methods.description: Asynchronously fetches spending analytics data for the authenticated user from the API.
